title: Spaghetti marinara
description: This recipe requires a bit of time but you will be rewarded with a superb spaghetti dish that sings of the flavours of the sea.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz mussels, cleaned and debearded, discarding any mussels with broken shells and any that refuse to close when tapped
8 whole large prawns, heads and shells removed but reserved
6 scallops, shelled and sliced in half
150g/5½oz white fish, such as pollock, skinned and cubed
salt and freshly ground black pepper
